Intel Directed IO Settings

Figure 7-14 Intel Directed IO

Table 7-7 Intel Directed IO Parameters

Field Name

Description

VT for Directed ID

The processor uses Intel Virtualization Technology for Directed I/O (VT-d). Select any of the option disabled, enabled or Platform Default.

Interrupt Remap

The processor supports Intel VT-d Interrupt Remapping. Select any of the option disabled, enabled or Platform Default.

Coherency Support

The processor supports Intel VT-d Coherency. Select any of the option disabled, enabled or Platform Default.

ATS Support

The processor supports Intel Address Translation Services (ATS). Select any of the option disabled, enabled or Platform Default.

Pass Through DMA Support

The processor supports Intel VT-d Pass Through DMA. Select any of the option disabled, enabled or Platform Default.
